data.name: Necro, the Cavelord
data.notes: "Necro, the Cavelord" lives in "the shaft" which true to its name is a shaft accessible from the highest mountain in the middle of Primordia. Flight is required to get up there in order to drop down into the shaft. Elvira, the Talondrake sleeps in the top of the shaft during the day but can easily by gotten by without disturbing its slumber.
